summary:
### September 2025 Summary for BuidlGuidl/SpeedRunEthereum-v2

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Added new guides, including an ERC4626 vaults guide for decentralized staking and a landing page for Solidity, enhancing educational resources.
  - Implemented a feature to open external links in new tabs for better user experience.
  - Introduced placeholders for upcoming Oracles and ZK Voting challenges, indicating future development focus.

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Resolved rendering issues with challenge headings containing bold text (issue #326 remains open for further checks).

- **Overall Themes:**
  - A strong emphasis on improving user experience through UI enhancements and better navigation.
  - Continued expansion of educational content and resources for builders, reflecting a commitment to community support and engagement.

topIssues.title: Add private notes field for builders (admin-only)
Challenge headings (H2, H3, etc.) are not rendered correctly when they contain bold text
Open guide/challenge links in new tab for better UX
Enhance `/builds` page before adding a header link

topPRs.title: Add dRPC to MEV blocking providers
Reorder side quests + add missing guide links
Open guide/challenge links in new tab
Add ERC4626 vaults guide to decentralized staking challenge
Sidequest link field and ENS guide linked to ENS sidequests
Move challenge "connect and register" flow to the footer
feat: add ChallengeHeader for challenge details
